scripts.build-js: browserify -t babelify app/write-message.js -o build/app/js/write-message.js && browserify -t babelify app/decode-message.js -o build/app/js/decode-message.js
scripts.build:css: cp app/css/*.css build/app/css/ && cp app/css/icons/* build/app/css/icons
scripts.cp-vendor: cp vendor/SoundJS/lib/soundjs-0.6.2.min.js build/vendor/SoundJS/lib/ && cp vendor/animate.css/animate.min.css build/vendor/animate.css/ && cp vendor/normalize.css build/vendor/
scripts.cp-html: cp decode.html build/ && cp writer.html build/
scripts.cp-all: npm run cp-media && npm run cp-vendor && npm run cp-html
scripts.build: npm run cp-all && npm run build-js && npm run build:css
